availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henderson Whiteford Gardner (Warren County, Kentucky, overseer and farmer.)

body.p: Warren County, Kentucky, overseer and farmer. Warren County, Kentucky, native. Son of Daniel Gardner and Permelia Gardner. Married to Elizabeth Strange Gardner in Warren County, Kentucky, on October 7, 1862. Married to Mary Keeth Gardner in Warren County on February 14, 1865. Resident of Warren County in 1850. Overseer in Warren County in 1860. Household owned eight enslaved persons in 1860. Farmer in Warren County in 1864.
